lever.additional:
Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description:
About Gojek:
Gojek is the largest consumer technology company in Indonesia, the world's 4th largest market by population. With over 25 million downloads, the Gojek app has become the leading transport, payments, courier, and hyperlocal shopping app in the country. Gojek is now the largest food delivery company in the world outside the China market, and is the equivalent of three Indian Unicorns combined in the transport, food delivery and payments markets. 

Gojek has a unique entrepreneurial environment, spanning multiple products. If you're an independent thinker and all-rounded person, this is the place for you. 

Product Management at Gojek will bring you closer to our customers and businesses in Indonesia and beyond across transport, payments, logistics, food and the retail industry. You’ll become the voice of our customers and partners by focusing on strategy and analytics, and working closely with design, engineering, marketing, and sales teams to define a product vision and a plan to achieve it.

About GoPay:
GoPay is South East Asia’s fastest-growing consumer payments and financial services app. GoPay serves more than 8 million unique users every day on a variety of payment avenues, providing the most convenient payment method in South East Asia. We have helped to facilitate transactions & also created 500,000+ jobs for our service providers - from the bike drivers down your street to your favorite Gorengan and Martabak stalls. But, the growth of GoPay does not stop here. We are hungry for more. With the addition of three companies (Kartuku, Midtrans, Mapan) laying the foundation for GoJek's financial services ecosystem, GoPay intends to become the payment platform for all the on-demand services.

About the Role:
As a Product Management Leader in the GoPay team, you will be responsible for setting direction and driving major strategic and product initiatives. You will have significant strategic impact and influence the direction of the company, as well as direct responsibility for new products and those already loved by millions of users. You will do this together with an amazing team of talented, passionate product managers and leaders from across functions. You must demonstrate a strategic approach to what matters to the business, an ability to lead through influence, and a talent for prioritizing quickly in ambiguity.
lever.descriptionPlain:
About Gojek:
Gojek is the largest consumer technology company in Indonesia, the world's 4th largest market by population. With over 25 million downloads, the Gojek app has become the leading transport, payments, courier, and hyperlocal shopping app in the country. Gojek is now the largest food delivery company in the world outside the China market, and is the equivalent of three Indian Unicorns combined in the transport, food delivery and payments markets. 

Gojek has a unique entrepreneurial environment, spanning multiple products. If you're an independent thinker and all-rounded person, this is the place for you. 

Product Management at Gojek will bring you closer to our customers and businesses in Indonesia and beyond across transport, payments, logistics, food and the retail industry. You’ll become the voice of our customers and partners by focusing on strategy and analytics, and working closely with design, engineering, marketing, and sales teams to define a product vision and a plan to achieve it.

About GoPay:
GoPay is South East Asia’s fastest-growing consumer payments and financial services app. GoPay serves more than 8 million unique users every day on a variety of payment avenues, providing the most convenient payment method in South East Asia. We have helped to facilitate transactions & also created 500,000+ jobs for our service providers - from the bike drivers down your street to your favorite Gorengan and Martabak stalls. But, the growth of GoPay does not stop here. We are hungry for more. With the addition of three companies (Kartuku, Midtrans, Mapan) laying the foundation for GoJek's financial services ecosystem, GoPay intends to become the payment platform for all the on-demand services.

About the Role:
As a Product Management Leader in the GoPay team, you will be responsible for setting direction and driving major strategic and product initiatives. You will have significant strategic impact and influence the direction of the company, as well as direct responsibility for new products and those already loved by millions of users. You will do this together with an amazing team of talented, passionate product managers and leaders from across functions. You must demonstrate a strategic approach to what matters to the business, an ability to lead through influence, and a talent for prioritizing quickly in ambiguity.

lists.content:
• Formulate a long and short-term product strategy to ensure delivery of key business goals.
  • Build, lead and inspire a high-performing product management team.
  • Identify business opportunities and how to best support them with product and platform capabilities.
  • Develop trusted relationships with engineering leaders, business leaders and stakeholders to drive optimized product delivery. 
  • Anticipate and aggressively solve problems that slow down products and programs from delivering on the objectives.
  • Balances urgent and effective action, commitment to excellence, and holds internal stakeholders accountable where appropriate
  • Strong communication, listening, interpersonal, influencing, and negotiation skills; able to convey important messages in a clear and compelling manner
  • Develop commitment in others by communicating clear expectations.
  • Mentoring direct reports, and setting an example in one’s own behavior

• Strong Product Management track record in a high scale environment.
  • Proven results in delivering world class product capabilities. 
  • Led a group of PMs for a large scale deployed consumer payment solution..
  • Strong business and technical acumen from a global Financial or Payments organization.
  • Global mindset with ability to think about culture, language, and other aspects when putting the customer at the center of all outcomes.
  • Ability to influence at all levels of the organization and across multiple domains.
  • Strong strategic planning and organizational skills; ability to lead a team across multiple locations.
  • Passion for leading and developing direct reports; coaching & mentoring them towards improving their professional skill sets; ability to lead and influence direct reports remotely.
  • Ability to manage a large, diverse set of deliverables – effective prioritize, stay on top of multiple work streams, monitor progress, hold owners accountable.
  • Communication style motivated by brevity and purposeful outcomes with experience interfacing with executives.
  • 15+ years’ experience as Product Manager with 10+ years direct senior leadership experience.
